summary: Tested PNG export functionality in Timeline tab - identified frontend navigation issues preventing complete testing of export feature

ui_bugs.issue: Project cards are not clickable - no href links found in project cards on /projects page
ui_bugs.impact: Blocks navigation to project details page, preventing access to Timeline tab

ui_bugs.issue: Quick Demo Login button does not work - authentication fails silently
ui_bugs.workaround: Manual login with email/password works correctly

integration_issues.issue: Cannot navigate from projects list to individual project details
integration_issues.impact: Prevents testing of Timeline tab and PNG export functionality

passed_tests: Manual login with demo credentials (demo@company.com/demo123456) works
Projects page loads and displays project cards
html2canvas library is properly installed in package.json

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All authentication and data APIs working
success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Login and data display working, navigation issues prevent complete testing

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix project card navigation: Project cards on /projects page are missing clickable links to individual project details. The cards display correctly but cannot be clicked to navigate to project details page where Timeline tab would be accessible. This prevents testing of the PNG export functionality in the Timeline tab. Need to add proper href attributes or click handlers to project cards.
